name: Load an image and store in flow.image

parameters.name: x
parameters.hint: the x coordinate to crop form

parameters.name: y
parameters.hint: the y coordinate to crop form

parameters.name: w
parameters.hint: the width of the crop region

parameters.name: h
parameters.hint: the height of the crop region

name: re-load the written files (check they are valid)
Demonstrate chained batch operations, chained viewer and output to BMP,JPG,PNG files
re-load files written by jimp Image node

selectedJimpFunction.name: flip
selectedJimpFunction.description: flip the image horizontally or vertically

parameters.name: horz
parameters.hint: if true the image will be flipped horizontally

parameters.name: vert
parameters.hint: if true the image will be flipped vertically

name: Look in the available properties in the debug side bar

selectedJimpFunction.name: blit
selectedJimpFunction.description: blit the image with another Jimp image at x, y, optionally cropped

parameters.name: src
parameters.hint: the source image (a Jimp instance)

parameters.name: x
parameters.hint: the x position to blit the image

parameters.name: y
parameters.hint: the y position to blit the image

parameters.name: srcx
parameters.hint: the x position from which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srcy
parameters.hint: the y position from which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srcw
parameters.hint: the width to which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srch
parameters.hint: the height to which to crop the source image

selectedJimpFunction.name: resize
selectedJimpFunction.description: resize the image. One of the w or h parameters can be set to automatic ("Jimp.AUTO" or -1).

parameters.name: w
parameters.hint: the width to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: h
parameters.hint: the height to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: mode
parameters.hint: a scaling method (e.g. Jimp.RESIZE_BEZIER)

parameters.hint: a scaling method (e.g. Jimp.RESIZE_BEZIER)

name: Working with multiple images and demonstrating Blit function

selectedJimpFunction.name: write
selectedJimpFunction.description: Write to file. NOTE: You can specify an alternative file extension type to change the type. Currently support types are jpg, png, bmp.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.hint: Name of the file
